prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing anniversary greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "An anniversary card with warm color that paints a bright future for the couple. The design style can be Impressionism."
Style: ðŸŒ¸ Dreamy Fantasy
Tone: ðŸ’• Romantic - sweet and loving
To: Aoi
From: Harry
Message: "My dearest Aoi,

Every year with you feels like a beautiful, sun-drenched painting, and our future looks even brighter and more colorful. Being loved by you is the greatest masterpiece of my life. Happy Anniversary, my love.

All my love, always,
Harry"

Reference: "Turn it into cute cartoon characters while keeping faces recognizable"

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sweet and loving tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way


- Include romantic elements like soft lighting, hearts, flowers, or intimate scenes



- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "anniversary" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in dreamy fantasy anime style, with soft pastels, magical atmosphere, detailed nature elements, whimsical characters, and enchanting fairy-tale qualities

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a anniversary card with sweet and loving tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in dreamy fantasy anime style, with soft pastels, magical atmosphere, detailed nature elements, whimsical characters, and enchanting fairy-tale qualities

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "My dearest Aoi,

Every year with you feels like a beautiful, sun-drenched painting, and our future looks even brighter and more colorful. Being loved by you is the greatest masterpiece of my life. Happy Anniversary, my love.

All my love, always,
Harry" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in dreamy fantasy anime style, with soft pastels, magical atmosphere, detailed nature elements, whimsical characters, and enchanting fairy-tale qualities

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in dreamy fantasy anime style, with soft pastels, magical atmosphere, detailed nature elements, whimsical characters, and enchanting fairy-tale qualities

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
Here are the detailed prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing anniversary greeting card, based on the provided image and context:

```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a 9:16 greeting card featuring a stylized, dreamy fantasy anime style. The illustration depicts two charming, simplified cartoon characters, a couple, holding hands and standing on a floating island-like structure. The female character wears a blue bucket hat, glasses, and a pink puffy jacket over a grey hoodie. The male character wears glasses, a blue shirt under a tan jacket, and holds a takeaway coffee cup. They are positioned towards the bottom center of the card, leaving ample space above for text. The background is a breathtaking sky filled with soft, swirling clouds in shades of pink, orange, and purple, reminiscent of a sunset, with tiny sparkling stars. A large, luminous dandelion-like seed head with glowing light bursts, symbolizing a bright future, is visible behind the couple on the right. The overall color palette is warm and inviting, with soft pastels and a gentle, romantic glow. The text \"Happy Anniversary\" is prominently displayed in the upper central area of the card in a beautiful, readable, flowing handwritten cursive script in a warm golden yellow color, perfectly complementing the sky's hues. The artwork should have a flat 2D appearance suitable for printing, with full-bleed backgrounds. Ensure faces and key elements are at least 10% away from the top/bottom edges and 0.5\" from left/right edges.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a 9:16 greeting card, continuing the dreamy fantasy anime style with a warm color palette. The design is minimalist and serene, focusing on subtle, unexpected artistic elements that evoke a peaceful closure. The primary visual is a continuation of the glowing, dandelion-like seed head motif from the front cover, depicted softly in the upper left and center of the card against a gradient sky of soft purples and pinks, with a few scattered, faint stars. Delicate, shimmering light particles or wisps of glowing mist subtly drift across the scene, adding to the magical atmosphere. There are no characters or text on this panel. The bottom-right corner, approximately 1 inch square, is kept completely clear and undecorated for a QR code. The overall mood is tranquil and sweet, harmonizing with the front cover.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior of a 9:16 greeting card, in a dreamy fantasy anime style with a warm, romantic color palette. This panel showcases a vibrant, expanding visual narrative. The scene features a stylized, winding path made of glowing, golden light particles leading upwards through a soft, ethereal sky. Along the path, subtly integrated, are clusters of luminous, stylized flowers that bloom in warm hues of peach, rose, and gold. Abstract, swirling patterns of soft pastel colors (pinks, oranges, yellows, purples) fill the background, creating a sense of movement and progression. Floating gently in the sky are small, delicate abstract shapes that suggest hearts or stars, made of shimmering light. The overall atmosphere is one of hopeful anticipation and blossoming love, visually representing the 'bright future' mentioned in the card's theme. The artwork is flat 2D with full-bleed backgrounds.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior of a 9:16 greeting card, rendered in a dreamy fantasy anime style with a warm, romantic color palette, continuing the visual story. The central focus is the integrated message text: \"My dearest Aoi,\n\nEvery year with you feels like a beautiful, sun-drenched painting, and our future looks even brighter and more colorful. Being loved by you is the greatest masterpiece of my life. Happy Anniversary, my love.\n\nAll my love, always,\nHarry\". This message is written in a beautiful, clearly readable, flowing handwritten cursive script in a warm golden yellow, with a natural pen-style appearance and slight variations in line weight. The text is elegantly framed by innovative, abstract decorative artwork rather than typical patterns. This framing consists of swirling, luminous ribbons of light and soft, glowing shapes in warm pastel colors, creating a sophisticated and artistic visual embrace for the heartfelt message. The background behind the framed text is a continuation of the ethereal, soft-hued sky with gentle clouds and faint stars, ensuring visual continuity. The overall mood is deeply romantic and loving, representing the emotional climax of the card. The artwork is flat 2D with full-bleed backgrounds, with the text and surrounding art positioned safely away from the edges."
}
```
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for an anniversary greeting card with a dreamy fantasy anime style. The background is a soft, painterly sky filled with swirling clouds in shades of pastel pink, peach, and lavender, evoking a warm sunset glow. A single, delicate dandelion seed drifts in the upper left quadrant, its feathery parachute illuminated by a soft, magical glow and trailing tiny sparkles. The overall composition is serene and minimalist, with ample clear space, particularly in the bottom right corner, to accommodate a QR code. The design is flat 2D artwork, with full-bleed extending to the edges, maintaining the romantic and sweet tone of the overall card narrative. No text or people are present. The style is impressionistic with subtle texture, creating a peaceful and enchanting resolution to the visual story.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a soft, painterly sky in shades of warm orange and vibrant purple, reminiscent of a sunset or sunrise. Wispy clouds are rendered with a textured, Impressionistic brushstroke. Scattered across the sky are delicate, stylized golden outlines of flowers and star-like elements, forming constellations. Some of these flower-like constellations are connected by faint golden lines, with one cluster subtly forming a heart shape connected to a stylized flower. The overall effect is dreamy, romantic, and enchanting, with a magical atmosphere created by the soft lighting and celestial motifs. The style is a dreamy fantasy anime, with soft pastels, detailed nature elements, and whimsical qualities.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with a dreamy fantasy anime style background. The background features a celestial, starry sky in soft blues and purples, illuminated by swirling, golden light trails that resemble comets or cosmic energy. The golden light elements frame the central text area, creating a sense of movement and warmth without overwhelming the message. The overall color palette is dominated by soft blues, golden yellows, and touches of pastel pink and orange, evoking a romantic and bright future. The message text, "My dearest Aoi, Every year with you feels like a beautiful, sun-drenched painting, and our future looks even brighter and more colorful. Being loved by you is the greatest masterpiece of my life. Happy Anniversary, my love. All my love, always, Harry," is presented in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script. The handwriting has an elegant, personal feel, resembling a sophisticated calligraphy with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. The typography is a warm, earthy brown, ensuring legibility against the vibrant background. The design prioritizes ample, clear space for the message, with the decorative elements subtly integrated into the background, guiding the eye towards the heartfelt words without creating harsh borders or frames. The atmosphere is sweet, loving, and enchanting.
